featured.text: The tower, of pinewood, will be built on eight pillars and will be topped with a flower of five metal petals of 700 square meters each.

definition.zh_def: 支撐結構的柱子或圓柱，通常用於建築或裝飾。
definition.en_def: A tall vertical structure used to support a building or as a decorative element.
definition.example: The ancient temple was supported by massive stone pillars.
